name: Ankita
title: A Frontend Developer
bio: Hello! My name is Ankita Devda (DOB : 7 th may ,2005), and I'm a passionate frontend developer. I specialize in creating responsive, user-friendly web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. With a strong eye for design and a dedication to writing clean, efficient code, I strive to enhance user experiences and bring web applications to life. Whether working on dynamic single-page applications or integrating APIs, I enjoy solving challenges and staying updated with the latest industry trends. Let's connect and create something amazing together!
